mapper.sql: a.id AS "id", a.create_by AS "createBy.id", a.update_by AS "updateBy.id", a.del_flag AS "delFlag", a.create_date AS "createDate", a.update_date AS "updateDate", a.remarks AS "remarks", a.vehicle_type AS "vehicleType", a.self_number AS "selfNumber", a.vehicle_num AS "vehicleNum", a.driver AS "driver", a.contact_phone AS "contactPhone", a.id_card AS "idCard", a.address AS "address", a.allowed_drive_model AS "allowedDriveModel", a.license_initial_date AS "licenseInitialDate", a.qua_cert_num AS "quaCertNum", a.qua_cert_initial_date AS "quaCertInitialDate", a.driver_date AS "driverDate", a.quit_date AS "quitDate", a.step AS "step", a.query_code AS "queryCode"
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO z_driver_business( id, create_by, update_by, del_flag, create_date, update_date, remarks, vehicle_type, self_number, vehicle_num, driver, contact_phone, id_card, address, allowed_drive_model, license_initial_date, qua_cert_num, qua_cert_initial_date, driver_date, quit_date, step, query_code ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{createBy.id}, #{updateBy.id}, #{delFlag}, #{createDate}, #{updateDate}, #{remarks}, #{vehicleType}, #{selfNumber}, #{vehicleNum}, #{driver}, #{contactPhone}, #{idCard}, #{address}, #{allowedDriveModel}, #{licenseInitialDate}, #{quaCertNum}, #{quaCertInitialDate}, #{driverDate}, #{quitDate}, #{step}, #{queryCode} )
mapper.update: UPDATE z_driver_business SET update_by = #{updateBy.id}, update_date = #{updateDate}, remarks = #{remarks}, vehicle_type = #{vehicleType}, self_number = #{selfNumber}, vehicle_num = #{vehicleNum}, driver = #{driver}, contact_phone = #{contactPhone}, id_card = #{idCard}, address = #{address}, allowed_drive_model = #{allowedDriveModel}, license_initial_date = #{licenseInitialDate}, qua_cert_num = #{quaCertNum}, qua_cert_initial_date = #{quaCertInitialDate}, driver_date = #{driverDate}, quit_date = #{quitDate}, step = #{step}, query_code = #{queryCode} WHERE id = #{id}
